specific_issues.description: H.R. 1388, Clean Air, Strong Economies Act (regarding EPA ozone NAAQS); H.R.1732, the Regulatory Integrity Protection Act of 2015 - Waters of the United States S.1140, the Federal Water Quality Protection Act - Waters of the United States S.1324, the Affordable Reliable Electricity Now Act of 2015 - greenhouse gas regulation S.1140, Federal Water Quality Protection Act (requires withdrawal of WOTUS rule and sets parameters for development of a new rule).
